Affix.Name: Scholar
Affix.Desc: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Scholar's Ink Cup
EQUIP_RING.Desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Scholar's Quill Pen
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Scholar's Lens
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Scholar's Bookmark
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Scholar's Clock
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.
